price: Ibiri mu birere n’ibiri ku isi bisingiza Allah, Umwami, Umutagatifu, Umunyacyubahiro uhebuje, Nyirubugenge buhambaye.
arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡمَلِكِ ٱلۡقُدُّوسِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yusabbiḥu lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi al-maliki al-qudūsi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
